metadata.title: CVE-2022-30630 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Uncontrolled recursion in Glob in io/fs before Go 1.17.12 and Go 1.18.4allows an attacker to cause a panic due to stack exhaustion via a pathwhich contains a large number of path separators.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-30630` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.18 - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1.1
golang-1.18-go - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1.1
golang-1.18-src - 1.18.1-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.18 package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.18.1-1ubuntu1.1').
